children.text: śṛṅgārī girijānane sakaruṇo ratyāṃ pravīraḥ smare
bībhatso'sthibhir utphaṇī ca bhaya-kṛn mūrtyādbhutas tuṅgayā
raudro dakṣa-vimardane ca hasakṛn nagnaḥ praśāntaś cirād
itthaṃ sarva-rasāśrayaḥ paśupatir bhūyāt satāṃ bhūtaye
kāvye śubhe'pi racite khalu no khalebhyaḥ
kṛpāṃ tathāpi sujanārtham idaṃ yataḥ kiṃ
teṣām apy upari sphuranti matayaḥ kasyāpi puṇyātmanaḥ
satyaṃ santi gṛhe gṛhe sukavayo yeṣāṃ vacaś cāturī
sve harmye kula-kanyakeva labhate jātair guṇair gauravam
duṣprāpaḥ sa tu ko'pi kovida-patir yad vāg-rasa-grāhiṇāṃ
dgārāvartibhir āpatadbhir abhitaḥ siktaś ca netrāmbubhiḥ
vācas tāś ca vidagdha-bhāva-caturāḥ sphārībhavan manmathā
haṃho mānasa kiṃ smarasy abhimatāḥ siddhyanti puṇyaiḥ kriyāḥ
strīṇām abhīṣṭas tv iha nāyakaḥ syāt
sītāyāṃ rāmavat so'yam anukūlaḥ smṛto yathā //
asmākaṃ sakhi vāsasī na rucire graiveyakaṃ nojjvalaṃ
no vaktrā gatir uddhataṃ na hasitaṃ naivāsti kaścin madaḥ
kiṃ tv anye'pi janā vadanti subhago'py asyāḥ priyo nānyato
dṛṣṭiṃ niḥkṣipatīti viśvam iyatā manyāmahe duḥkhitam
saivāsya praṇatis tad eva vacanaṃ tā eva keli-kriyā
bhītiḥ saiva tad eva narma-madhuraṃ pūrvānurāgocitam
kiṃ syād ittham aharniśaṃ sakhi mano dolāyate cintayā
punar iha yuvāṃ satyaṃ śiṣṭaṃ tad atra kṛtāgasi
praṇayini punar yuktaṃ rantuṃ na veti batāvayo
rdhruvam upagate karṇau praṣṭuṃ kuraṅga-dṛśau dṛśau
kopāt kiñcid upānato'pi rabhasād ākṛṣya keśeṣv alaṃ
nītvā mohana-mandiraṃ dayitayā hāreṇa bahvā dṛḍham
bhūyo yāsyasi tad-gṛhān iti muhuḥ kaṇṭhāruddhākṣaraṃ
jalpantyā śravaṇotpalena sukṛtī kaścid rahas tāḍyate
jalpantyāḥ paruṣaṃ ruṣā mama balāc cumbaty asāv ānanaṃ
mṛd-gātyāśu karaṃ kareṇa bahuśaḥ santāḍyamāno'pi san
ālīnāṃ purato dadhāti śirasā pāda-prahārāṃs tato
no jāne sakhi sāmprataṃ praṇayien kupyāmi tasmai katham
dhik tvām dhūrta gata-trapa praṇayinī saiva tvayārādhyatā
yasyāḥ pāda-talāhatiṃ tava hṛdi vyākhyāty asau yāvakaḥ
ity ukto'pi na nāma muñcati yadā pādāv ayaṃ durjano
mithyāvāda-vicakṣaṇaḥ kim aparaṃ kuryāṃ vayasye tadā
eṣāṃ prabandha-viṣayo vyavahāraḥ prāyaśo bhavet pracuraḥ &
vimuñcāmuṃ mānaṃ saphalaya vacaḥ sādhu suhṛdāṃ
mudhā santāpena glapayasi kim aṅgaṃ smara-bhuvā
na mugdhe pretyetuṃ prabhavati gataḥ kāla-hariṇaḥ
praṇayini bhṛśaṃ tasmin mānaṃ manasvini mā kṛthāḥ
kim aparam ito yuktāyuktair vinā hy amunā tava
ayam api bhavet sampraty api kṣayānala-saṃnibhaḥ
dūrāt kandalitair hṛdi pravitataiḥ kaṇṭhe luṭhadbhir haṭhā
mthyālambita-sauṣṭhavena kim ataḥ kopena kāntaṃ prati
kathaṃcin no tṛptis taruṇimani manye mṛga-dṛśaḥ
yathā dṛṣṭis tiryak patati sahasā saṅkucati ca
na madhyasthaṃ cetaḥ praguṇa-ramaṇīyaṃ na ca dṛḍham
valati ca śayanīye kampate ca prakāmam
vadati ca yad alakṣyaṃ kiñcid uktāpi bhūyo
manyau kṛte prathamam eva vikāram anyaṃ
no jānatī nava-vadhū rudatī paraṃ sā
tarat-tāraṃ cakṣuḥ kṣapayati munīnām api dṛśaḥ
maho tanvyās tulyaṃ taruṇimani sarvaṃ vijayate
dṛṣṭiḥ snihyati nirbharaṃ priyatame vaidagdhya-bhājo giraḥ
vakṣaḥ saṃvriyate punaḥ punar idaṃ bhārālasaṃ gamyate
jātā subhru manoramā tava daśā kasmād akasmād iyam
subhaga kuravakas tvaṃ no kim āliṅganoktiḥ
kim u mukhamadirecchuḥ kesaro no hṛdisthaḥ
priyam iti parihāsāt peśalaṃ kācid ūce
kānte tathā katham api prathitaṃ mṛgākṣyā
kṛtvāneka-vidhāṃ rasena surate keliṃ kathañcic cirā
supteyaṃ kila sundarīti subhagaḥ svairaṃ tathaivāsvaja
kruddhāyāṃ mayi nātha te kadalikākāṇḍair alātāyitam
kālo'nyaḥ khalu ko'pi so'mṛtamayo jāto viṣātmādhunā
dhik tvāṃ dhūrta viniryad-aśrur abalā mohaṃ rudantī gatā
asmākam asti na hi kaścid ihāvakāśas
seyaṃ paraṅginī mṛṇāla-latikām ādāya yasyāḥ priyo
bandhūkaṃ ca tad etad āli vidalad yat tena sīmantitaṃ
yatra sveda-lavair alaṃ vlulitair vyālupyate candanaṃ
svacchandair maṇitaiś ca yatra raṇitaṃ nihnūyate nūpuram
sakhyas tat-surataṃ bhaṇāmi rataye śeṣā tu loka-sthitiḥ
svāmin bhaṅgurayālakaṃ sa-tilakaṃ bhālaṃ vilāsin kuru
prāṇeśa truṭitaṃ payodhara-taṭe hāraṃ punar yojaya
spṛṣṭā tena tatheti jāta-pulakā prāptā punar mohanam
dhanyās tāḥ sakhi yoṣitaḥ priyatame sarvāṅga-lagne'pi yāḥ
prāgalbhyaṃ prathayanti mohana-vidhāv ālambya dhairyaṃ mahat
ko'yaṃ kā vayam atra kiṃ nu surataṃ naiva smṛtir jāyate
yad vācaḥ pracuropacāra-caturā yat sādaraṃ dūrataḥ
pratyutthānam idaṃ svahasta-nihitaṃ yad-bhinnam apy āsanam
utpaśyāmi yad evam eva ca muhur dṛṣṭiṃ sakhī-saṃmukhīṃ
tac chaṅke tava paṅkajākṣi balavān ko'py aprasādo mayi
yat pāṇir na nivārito nivasana-granthiṃ saumudgranthaya
nbhrū-bhedo na kṛto manāg api muhur yat-khaṇḍyamāne'dhare
yan niḥśaṅkam ivārpitaṃ vapur aho patyuḥ samāliṅgane
kṛtaṃ mithyā-jalpair virama viditaṃ kāmuka cirāt
priyāṃ tām evoccair abhisara yadīyair nakha-padaiḥ
vilāsaiś ca prāptaṃ tava hṛdi padaṃ raga-bahulair
mayā kiṃ te kṛtyaṃ dhruvam akuṭilācāra-parayā
sā bāḍhaṃ bhavatekṣiteti niviḍaṃ saṃyamya bāhvoḥ srajā
bhūyo drakṣyasi tāṃ śaṭheti dayitaṃ saṃtarjya saṃtarjya ca
ālīnāṃ pura eva nihnuti-paraḥ kopād raṇan-nūpuraṃ
ruṇadhmy ahaṃ tad iti nimīya locane
kim api lalitaiḥ snigdhaiḥ kiñcit kim apy atikuñcitaiḥ
kim api valitaiḥ kandarpeṣūn hasadbhir ivekṣaṇaiḥ
niśamayya bahir manoharaṃ svaram aikṣiṣṭa tathāparā yā &
kasyāścit subhaga iti śrutaś ciraṃ yas taṃ
satyaṃ santi gṛhe gṛhe priyatamā yeṣāṃ bhujāliṅgana
preyān ko'py aparo'yam atra sukṛtī dṛṣṭe'pi yasmin vapuḥ
mā māṃ vallabha saṃspṛśeti sahasā śūnyaṃ vadantī muhuḥ
sakhyā no hasitā sacintam asakṛt saṃśocitā pratyuta
vikasati kairava-nikare sarati ca sarasī-samīraṇo sutanu &
cambaty ambaram indau tava tena vinā ratiḥ kīdṛk //
ajananir astu dṛśos tava kucayor abhava-niralaṃ bhavatu &
yadi dṛśyate na sa yuvā nirbharam āliṅgyate no vā //
kāmaṃ na paśyati didṛkṣata eva bhūmnā
tava kumudinīva vāñchati nṛ-candra bālā kara-spṛśam //
yat khidyate tanur iyaṃ ca tad eṣa doṣaḥ
abhimukha-gate yasminn eva priye bahuśo vada
atha kila valal-līlālokaṃ sa eṣa tathekṣitaḥ
katham api yathā dṛṣṭā manye kṛtaṃ śruti-laṅghanam
dūrād eva vilokayety abhimate tad vaktra-dattekṣaṇaṃ
animittaṃ yad vihasati niṣkāraṇam eva yat sakhīṃ vadati &
dayitaṃ vilokya tad iyaṃ śaṃsati tad adhīnam ātmānam //
ullaṅghyāḸ sakhī-vacaḥ samucitām utsṛjya lajjām alaṃ
hitvā bhītibharaṃ nirasya ca nijaṃ saubhāgya-garvaṃ manāk
ājñāṃ kevalam eva manmatha-guror ādāya nūnaṃ mayā
dāstāṃ rantum aho nirīkṣitum api preyān na sambhāvitaḥ
nnetrāmbhobhiś cham iti patitaiḥ sicyate ca stanāntaḥ
tasyāḥ kiñcit subhaga tad abhūt tānavaṃ tvad-viyoge
veśyānāṃ dhṛti-dhāma puṣpa-dhanuṣaḥ prāpnoti dhanyo ratam
likhati kucayoḥ patraṃ kaṇṭhe niyojayati srajaṃ
tilakam alike kurvan gaṇḍād udasyati kuntalān
iti caṭu-śatair vāraṃ vāraṃ vapuḥ paritaḥ spṛśan
kiṃ ruddhaḥ priyayā kayācid athavā sakhyā tayodvejitaḥ
kiṃ vā kāraṇa-gauravaṃ kim api yan nādyāgato vallabhaḥ
ity ālocya mṛgīdṛśā karatale saṃsthāpya vaktrāmbujaṃ
dīrghe niḥśvasitaṃ ciraṃ ca ruditaṃ kṣiptāś ca puṣpa-srajaḥ
evaṃ nau surataṃ bhaviṣyati cirād adyeti sānandayā
yat-pāda-praṇataḥ priyaḥ paruṣayā vācā sa nirvārito
yat-sakhyā na kṛtaṃ vaco jaḍatayā yan-manyur eko dhṛtaḥ
pāpasyāsya phalaṃ tad etad adhunā yac candanendu-dyuti
yat saṅketa-gṛhaṃ priyeṇa kathitaṃ sampreṣya dūtīṃ svayaṃ
tac chūnyaṃ suciraṃ niṣevya sudṛśā paścāc ca bhagnāśayā
bhūmāv akṣaramālikeva likhitā dīrghaṃ rudatyā śanaiḥ
sotkaṇṭhaṃ ruditaṃ sakampam asakṛd yātaṃ sa-bāṣpaṃ ciraṃ
cakṣur dikṣu niveśitaṃ sa-karuṇaṃ sakhyā samaṃ jalpitam
tat tat kiṃcid anuṣṭhitaṃ mṛgadṛśā no yatra vācāṃ gatiḥ
no bhītaṃ taḍito dṛśā jalamucā tad-darśanākāṅkṣayā
no garjir gaṇitā bhṛśaṃ śruti-mukhaṃ tad-vāci saṃcintya ca
dhārāpātasamudbhavā na ca matā pīḍā tad-āliṅganaṃ
kānte kiṃ kupitāsi kaḥ para-jane prāṇeśa kopo bhavet
ko'yaṃ subhru paras tvam eva dayite dāso'smi kas te paraḥ
ity uktvā praṇataḥ priyaḥ kṣititalād utthāpya sānandayā
pādāntaḥ-praṇate priye prakaṭayaty antaḥ prasādaṃ priyā
iti śrī-rudra-bhaṭṭa-viracite śṛṅgāra-tilakābhidhāne kāvya-rasālaṅkāre sambhoga-śṛṅgāro nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ
jñeyaḥ pūrvānurāgo'yam aprāptau ca daśā yathā //
yat sārair iva paṅkajasya ghaṭitaṃ yac candra-garbhād iva
yat saṃsicya sudhā-rasair iva rater āsthāna-bhūmīkṛtaṃ
tad bhūyo'pi kadā saroruha-dṛśaḥ paśyāmi tasyā mukham
praviśati yathā gehe'kasmād bahiś ca viceṣṭate
vadati ca yathā sakhyā sārdhaṃ sahāsam ihotsukā
dayita-vadanāloke mandaṃ yathā ca calaty asau
mṛga-dṛśi tathaitasyāṃ manye smareṇa kṛtaṃ padam
satyaṃ durlabha eṣa vallabhatamo rāgo mamāsmin punaḥ
ko'py anyo'sti gurur na cātinipuṇāḥ sakhyo'sya saṃbodhane
saṃcintyeti mṛgīdṛśā priyatame dṛṣṭe ślathāṃ mekhalāṃ
badhnantyā na gataṃ sthitaṃ na ca galad-vāso na vā saṃvṛtam
induṃ nindati padma-kandala-dalais talpaṃ na vā manyate
karpūraṃ kirati prayāti na ratiṃ prāleya-dhārā-gṛhe
śvāsaiḥ kevalam eva khedita-tanur dhyāyaty asau bālikā
yat tat ko'pi yuvā dhruvaṃ smara-suhṛc-cetasy amuṣāḥ sthitaḥ
sā vāṇī jita-kāma-kārmuka-ravā saundaryam etasya tat
cetaś cumbita-kāla-kūṭam iva me kasmād idaṃ muhyati
prāṇān dhatse katham api balād gacchataḥ śalya-tulyāṃ
stat kenāsau sutanu jantio mānmathas te vikāraḥ
itthaṃ tena nirīkṣitaṃ na ca mayāpy evaṃ samālokitas
tenoktaṃ subhagena tatra na mayā dattaṃ vaco mandayā
tat satyaṃ kathayāli kiṃ sa subhagaḥ kupyen na mahyaṃ gata
ity uktvā sudṛśā kayāpi valita-grīvaṃ dṛśau sphārite
kiṃcid dhyāyati niścalā ca balavad romāñcitā kampate
rodity aṅga-gatāṃ vilokya suciraṃ vīṇām api vyāpṛtā
svalpair eva dinair iyaṃ vara-tanuḥ kenāpi saṃśikṣitā
tanv-aṅgyāḥ kathitaḥ smareṇa guruṇā ko'py eṣa kaṣṭa-kramaḥ
huṃkāraḥ param eka eva vacana-sthāne sthitaḥ sāṃprataṃ
nīrandhraṃ timiraṃ kiranti salilaṃ garjanta ete ghanāḥ
gacchāmīti vadaty asāv api muhuḥ śaṅkākulā kevalaṃ
cetaś citram aho tathāpi ramate saṃketake kāminām
no jāne kim ayaṃ priye prakaṭitaḥ kopo'bhilāṣo'thavā
bimboṣṭhaḥ sphurati prayāti paṭutāṃ gaṇḍa-sthale śoṇimā
yātas tiryag amū dṛśau ca balavad bhrū-yugmaam udbhrāmyati
itthaṃ caṇḍi tathā tavaiṣa ruciraḥ kopa-kramo jṛmbhate
jāto'yaṃ praṇatīr apāsya sutarām etad-didṛkṣur yathā
vāco vāgmini kiṃ tavādya paruṣāḥ subhru bhruvor vibhramai
rviśrāntaṃ kuta eva lola-nayane kiṃ lohite locane
svedaḥ kiṃ nu ghanastani stana-taṭe muktā-phalānāṃ tulāṃ
dhatte muñca ruṣaṃ mamātra dayite leśo'pi nāsty āgasaḥ
mām eva tāḍaya nitambini yady akasmāt
kopo bhavet tava mukhaṃ tu nijaṃ kim etat
dūtī-janasya parato laghur api doṣo gurūyate prāyaḥ &
etat kiṃ nanu karṇa-bhūṣaṇa-mayaṃ hāraḥ sukāñcī navā
baddhā kācid iyaṃ tvayādya tilakaḥ ślāghyaḥ priye kalpitaḥ
tanvī mānam upekṣayaiva śanakair dhūrtena saṃmocitā
nivṛtya kiṃ kim idam iti bruvāṇayā
dayita manorama ramaṇī-jīvita ity ādi nāma syāt //
prītau bhartari sudṛśām aprītau punar amūni śaṭha-dhṛṣṭau &
lobhād atipravāsāt strīṇāṃ dveṣyaḥ priyo bhavati //
dṛṣṭaṃ ketaka-dhūli-dhūsaram idaṃ vyoma kramād vīkṣitāḥ
sakhyaḥ saṃvṛṇutāśru muñcata bhayaṃ kasmān mudevākulā
etān apy adhunāsmi vajraghaṭitā nūnaṃ sahiṣye dhanān
tat kiṃ yad viparītam atra na kṛtaṃ tasyā viyogena me
sakhyaṃ tvayā vapur idaṃ gamitaṃ varākyāḥ
niḥśvāsaiḥ saha sāmprataṃ sakhi gatā vṛddhiṃ dhruvaṃ rātrayaḥ
sārdhaṃ locana-vāriṇā vigalitaṃ yat prāktanaṃ me sukham
prāṇāśā tanutām upaiti ca muhur nūnaṃ tanu-spardhayā
kandarpaḥ param eka eva vijayī yāte'pi kānte sthitaḥ
itthaṃ subhru visaṃsthulāpi viraha-vyāpād vimardād iyaṃ
kiṃ tatra nāsti rajanī kiṃ vā candro na suṣṭhu-ruciḥ &
yena sakhi vallabhām api na smarati sa māṃ videśa-ruciḥ //
prakaṭaya śaśinn āśāḥ kāmaṃ manoja samullasa
hṛdayam adhunā kiñcit kartuṃ mamānyad ihecchati
kandarpaṃ haratā hareṇa bhuvanaṃ niḥsāram etat kṛtam
vaktraṃ candramasā dṛśau mṛga-gaṇaiḥ keśāḥ kalāpi-vrajair
saugandhyaṃ malayānilena balinā tanvī vibhajyeti sā
sarvair niṣkaruṇair hṛtā dhruvam aho daivena kiṃcin na me
iyatīṃ subhagāvasthāṃ gato'si yasyāḥ kṛte smarātaṅkāt &
mūrcchāṃ harāmi sā tava gata-puṇyā nayana-salilena //
mayā ko'yaṃ mugdhe kathaya likhitaḥ satvara-sakhī
na vaktuṃ tanvaṅgyā śakitam atha coddāma-vidalat
pratyaṅgaṃ prati karma narma-parayā kṛtvādhirūḍhaṃ smarā
dautsukyaṃ pravilokya mohana-vidhau cāturyam ālokya ca
sadyo yāvaka-maṇḍanaṃ na racitaṃ pāde kuraṅgī-dṛśā
smerāntā viśada-cchade ca śayane dṛṣṭiḥ samāropitā
tad bāḍhaṃ kriyate yad asya rucitaṃ cāṭūccakais tanyate
sakhyā mugdha-vadhūr iyaṃ rati-vidhau yatnena saṃśikṣitā
nribhrāntaṃ guruṇā punaḥ śata-guṇaṃ puṣpeṣuṇā kāritā
tava tu hṛdaye śīte'py evaṃ sadaiva sukhāptaye
mama sahacarī sā niḥsnehā manāg api na sthitā
ko'yaṃ vimuñca kuru nātha vaco madīyam
pañcatvam āśu nanu yāsyati sā varākī
sphurati yad idam uccair locanaṃ tanvi vāmaṃ
nanu vadati tad adya preyasā saṃgamaṃ te
iti śrī-rudra-bhaṭṭa-viracite śṛṅgāra-tilakābhidhāne kāvya-rasālaṅkāre vipralambho nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ
pāṇau kaṅkaṇam utphaṇaḥ phaṇipatir netraṃ jvalat-pāvakaṃ
mugdhe tvaṃ subhage na vetsi madana-vyāpāram adyāpi taṃ
nūnaṃ te jalajaiṣiṇāyam alinā dṛṣṭo na bhartādharaḥ
sakhyaivaṃ hasitaṃ vadhūṃ prati tathā sānandam āvirbhavad
tyaktvā guñja-phalāni mauktikamayī bhūṣā staneṣv āhitā
strīṇāṃ kaṣṭam idaṃ kṛtaṃ sarasijaṃ karṇe na barhi-cchadam
itthaṃ nātha tavāridhāmni śavarair ālokya citra-sthitiṃ
bhartā saṃgara eva mṛtyu-vasatiṃ prāptaḥ samaṃ bandhubhir
yūnāṃ kāmam iyaṃ dunoti ca mano vaidhavya-bhāvād vadhūḥ
bālo dustyaja eka eva ca śiśuḥ kaṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ vedhasā
yaḥ prāṇāpahatiḥ kṛtā mama pituḥ kṣudrair yudhi kṣatriyai
rāmo'haṃ ramaṇīr vihāya balavan niḥśeṣam eṣāṃ haṭhāt
śibir ahaṃ bhavatā vidito na kiṃ
mad-vakṣasy avalambya kiṃcid adhunā tad vismṛtaṃ vajriṇā
yuddhaṃ yady avalambate sa tu punaḥ sajjo'smy ahaṃ rāvaṇaḥ
dhanam aharahar dattaṃ svīyaṃ yathārthitam arthine
praṇayini jane rāgodrikte ratir vihitā ciraṃ
kim aparam ataḥ kartavyaṃ nas tanāv api nādaraḥ
saundaryaṃ śaśa-lāñchanasya kavibhir mithyaiva tad varṇyate
nāyaṃ garji-ravo gabhīra-paruṣaṃ tūryaṃ tadīyaṃ tv idaṃ
lakṣmyās tvaṃ janako nidhiś ca payasāṃ niḥśeṣa-ratnākaro
maryādā-niratas tvam eva jaladhe brūte'tra ko'nyādṛśam
kiṃ tv ekasya gṛhaṃ gatasya baḍavā-vahneḥ sadā tṛṣṇayā
klāntasyodara-pūraṇe'pi na saho yat tan manāṅ madhyamam
atyadbhutaṃ narādhipa tava kīrtir dhavalayanty api jaganti &
raktān karoti suhṛdo malinayati ca vairi-vadanāni //
tripura-vadhād eva gatām ullāsam umāṃ samasta-deva-natām &
iti śrī-rudra-bhaṭṭa-viracite śṛṅgāra-tilakābhidhāne kāvya-rasālaṅkāre hāsyādi-rasa-nirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ
